name: Solar System (itch) (KaileeBren)
description:
This is my Solar System Project for my Unity 2020 Coursera course. Within, the modifications I made are as follows:

  1. Created Mercury, Venus, and Mars with spacing and rotation speed rational to that of actual space.
  2. Changed the positions of the main and minimap camera.
  3. Added audio to each individual planet.

Created by: 

Kailee Brennecke
